TopicTitle: How do you have upgradeable buildings in Sandbox Mode?

Articles.Content: How do you make upgradeable buildings in Sandbox mode? I think that would be a fun experience for me and other people. (if it matters, I don't use Windows.)  Thanks!
I'm confused.. what would be the point?

I think the closest you could come would be to start a Career game, and cheat up enough science with the console to clear the tech tree.  And I guess cheat up money if you want.  But if you have unlimited money, then upgrading the buildings would be rather trivial.

There's a setting for that in Science mode -- you can choose whether your buildings start off upgraded or not, and whether your Kerbals start off with no stars, or five.  It's not clear to me how you'd upgrade the buildings in Science, however, since it doesn't keep track of funds.  So, start a Science save, set to "not upgraded", and then use the "cheat" menu to unlock the tech tree.
